review.reviewBody: Just got a breakfast bagel and iced caramel latte and it was perfect! I haven’t visited their cafe yet in person. One thing I’d love to see is that they expand more food items on the menu. I hope they open a location in Langley as well.
smoothies great but coconut water was missing
I paid for extra cheese on my Honolua Breakfast Sandwich and they didnt add it. coffee was good
Ordered the 3 for 2 bags of coffee but did not receive any coffee beans. Obviously the most expensive item!
